snippet.title: 3DO Games Decathlon Gameplay Demonstration
snippet.description:
This is a video of some of the gameplay in the upcoming 3DO GAMES: DECATHLON game for 3DO. As you see there are some technical glitches (check the discus and audio defects) but it is very playable and quite well done for it's day.

There has been some editing done for sake of time, especially for the long distance run as you have to wait for every player no matter how slow to finish.

Enjoy folks!
